description: All pubs, nightclubs and bars that do not serve food at tables will be closed for at least 10 days.
title: Coronavirus: Ban on Guernsey pubs, bars and nightclubs
title_page: Coronavirus: Ban on Guernsey pubs, bars and nightclubs - BBC News
maintext: "This will come at very short notice to licensees but we will not make apologies for taking swift action to protect our community. This is a fast-developing situation and we are having to react in real time," he added.
